products.name: Silicone Fei Dai
description: Best hammer in the market right now. No words or explanation could transmit the peace of having this hammer. If thinking on buying it, do not hesitate.

products.name: Screwdriver Fei Dai
description: A screwdriver is an essential hand tool designed for driving screws into materials or removing them with precision and control, featuring a slender, ergonomic handle—typically made from durable materials like wood, plastic, or rubberized composites for a comfortable grip that reduces hand fatigue during prolonged use—and a hardened steel shaft, varying in length between 3 and 12 inches to suit tasks from intricate electronics repair to heavy furniture assembly, tipped with a versatile flathead ideal for slotted screws, making the Fei Dai a reliable choice for both professional tradespeople and home DIY enthusiasts.

products.name: Hammer
description: A hammer is a versatile, time-honored tool designed for driving nails, breaking apart objects, or shaping materials through the application of forceful impact.
Typically consisting of a sturdy handle and a weighted head, the hammer’s design has evolved over millennia to suit a wide range of tasks, from delicate craftsmanship to heavy-duty construction.

The handle, traditionally made of wood such as hickory or ash for its strength and shock-absorbing qualities, is now often crafted from modern materials like fiberglass or steel, offering enhanced durability and a comfortable grip.
Its length can vary, generally ranging from 10 to 18 inches, depending on the intended use—shorter for precision work, longer for greater leverage and power.

products.name: Wrench
description: A wrench is an essential tool for any toolkit, designed to provide a firm grip and leverage for turning nuts, bolts, and other fasteners with precision.
Crafted with a durable steel body, this wrench ensures long-lasting performance, while its ergonomic handle offers comfort during extended use.
Ideal for automotive repairs, plumbing, and general assembly tasks, this wrench is a must-have for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts.

products.name: Drill Fei Dai
description: A drill is a powerful tool designed for creating holes in various materials or driving fasteners with speed and precision.
Featuring a robust motor and adjustable speed settings, this Fei Dai drill is perfect for woodworking, metalworking, and construction projects.
Its lightweight design and ergonomic grip make it easy to handle, while the durable construction ensures reliability for both professional and home use.

products.name: LED lamp Fei Dai
description: This LED lamp from Fei Dai offers energy-efficient lighting with a sleek, modern design, perfect for any home or office space.
With adjustable brightness settings and a long lifespan of up to 25,000 hours, it provides reliable illumination for reading, working, or creating a cozy ambiance.
The lamp features a sturdy base and a flexible arm, allowing you to direct light exactly where you need it.

products.name: INTERIOR PAINT FEI DAI
description: Fei Dai Interior Paint is a high-quality, water-based paint designed for easy application and a smooth, durable finish on walls and ceilings.
Available in a soft matte green, this 2.5L can covers up to 30 square meters, making it ideal for refreshing living rooms, bedrooms, or any interior space.
Its low-odor formula ensures a pleasant painting experience, and it dries quickly, allowing for a second coat in just 2-4 hours.

products.name: Air Conditioner Fei Dai
description: The Fei Dai Air Conditioner provides powerful cooling for any room, with energy-efficient technology to keep your space comfortable during hot summer days.
Featuring adjustable temperature settings and a remote control for convenience, this unit is perfect for homes or small offices.
Its sleek design blends seamlessly with any decor, and the quiet operation ensures minimal disturbance.

products.name: Pedestal Fan Fei Dai
description: Stay cool with the Fei Dai Pedestal Fan, designed to deliver a strong, consistent breeze with three speed settings to suit your needs.
Its adjustable height and oscillating head ensure optimal airflow throughout the room, making it ideal for living rooms, bedrooms, or offices.
The fan is easy to assemble and features a sturdy base for stability, combining functionality with a modern design.

products.name: Duct Tape Fei Dai
description: Fei Dai Duct Tape is a versatile, heavy-duty adhesive tape perfect for a wide range of repairs and construction projects.
With strong adhesion and a durable, waterproof backing, this tape is ideal for sealing, bundling, or temporarily fixing materials like pipes, wood, or plastic.
Each roll measures 50 meters in length and 48mm in width, providing ample coverage for both professional and DIY use.

products.name: Adapter Fei Dai
description: The Fei Dai Universal Plug Adapter is a must-have for travelers, compatible with outlets in over 150 countries, including the USA, Europe, UK, and Australia.
Featuring a compact design with a built-in safety shutter and a 10A fuse for protection, this adapter ensures safe and reliable charging for your devices.
Supports a voltage range of 110-240V, making it ideal for phones, laptops, and other electronics.

products.name: Cement mix Fei Dai
description: Fei Dai Cement Mix 25kg is a high-quality, ready-to-use cement ideal for a wide range of construction projects, including foundations, slabs, and repairs.
This 25kg bag provides excellent strength and durability, with a fast-setting formula that ensures quick and reliable results.
Perfect for both professional builders and DIY enthusiasts, it can be mixed with sand and gravel to create strong concrete.

products.name: Door handle Fei Dai
description: The Fei Dai Brass Door handle combines elegance and functionality, featuring a polished brass finish that adds a touch of sophistication to any door.
Designed for easy installation, this doorknob includes a secure locking mechanism, making it ideal for interior doors in homes or offices.
Durable and resistant to corrosion, it ensures long-lasting performance and a comfortable grip for daily use.

products.name: Innopack Exterior Painting
description: Transform your home’s exterior with Innopack Dark Green Exterior Paint! This rich, deep green hue offers a bold yet timeless look, perfect for siding, trim, or accents. Formulated for durability, it resists fading, weathering, and peeling, ensuring long-lasting vibrancy. Easy to apply with excellent coverage, this paint brings a touch of nature-inspired elegance to any outdoor space.

products.name: Window
description: Upgrade your home with our durable, energy-efficient window! Featuring a sleek design, double-pane glass for superior insulation, and easy-to-use tilt-in functionality for effortless cleaning. Perfect for any room, this window offers both style and practicality at an unbeatable price.
40cm x 80cm.

products.name: Doorknob Fei Dai
description: Enhance your door with this sleek, reliable doorknob! Crafted for durability and smooth operation, it features a classic design that complements any style, from modern to traditional. Easy to install with a secure fit, this doorknob offers both functionality and a polished finish, making it the perfect upgrade for your home’s interior or exterior doors.
